cello.alt.servlet.resource
Class URLResource

java.lang.Object
  cello.alt.servlet.resource.URLResource
All Implemented Interfaces:
MutableResource, Resource
Direct Known Subclasses:
FileResource, JarScriptLoader.JarResource
public class URLResource
extends java.lang.Object
implements MutableResource

Defines a default implementation for MutableResources. getTag() is based on URL is not necessarily efficient (involves calling URL.openConnection()), so it may be wise to override this class with a more

Author:
Marcello
